mapper.sql: id, user_id, login_name, display_name, ip, oper_type, oper_desc, fun_name, bean_class_name, oper_time, delete_flag, data
mapper.select:
select r.* ,u.nickName from sys_operlog r left join manager u on r.user_id=u.id where 1=1
and r.user_id like concat('%',#{userId},'%')
and u.NICKNAME like concat('%',#{displayName},'%')
and r.login_name like concat('%',#{loginName},'%')
and r.ip like concat('%',#{ip},'%')
and r.oper_type like concat('%',#{operType},'%')
order by r.oper_time desc
mapper.delete: update sys_operlog set delete_flag=1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_operlog
id,
user_id,
login_name,
display_name,
ip,
oper_type,
oper_desc,
fun_name,
bean_class_name,
oper_time,
delete_flag,
data,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{funName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beanClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_operlog
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_type = #{operType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_desc = #{operDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fun_name = #{funName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bean_class_name = #{beanClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_time = #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_operlog set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_type = #{operType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_desc = #{operDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fun_name = #{funName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bean_class_name = #{beanClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_time = #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
